summary: Frontend testing of image lightbox and ImageUploader features. All tested features are working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: ImageLightbox component properly handles image objects and strings
ImageUploader component correctly uses API_URL from environment variable
Good use of data-testid attributes for testing (lightbox-close, lightbox-image, lightbox-prev, lightbox-next)
Crop modal has proper z-index (z-[60]) to appear above other modals
context_for_next_testing_agent: Image lightbox and ImageUploader features are fully functional. Admin login works with admin/admin credentials.

Menu Page - Click on menu item image ope.details: Clicking on menu item images (e.g., F&F Signature Wings) opens the ImageLightbox component

Menu Page - Lightbox shows item name, de.details: Lightbox displays: name='F&F Signature Wings', description, price='$14'

Menu Page - ESC key closes lightbox.details: Pressing ESC key successfully closes the lightbox

Menu Page - Zoom icon appears on hover.details: ZoomIn icon with white/90 background appears when hovering over menu card images

Menu Page - Close button (X) closes ligh.details: Clicking the X button (data-testid='lightbox-close') successfully closes the lightbox

Locations Page - Click on location image.details: Clicking on location images opens the ImageLightbox component

Locations Page - Lightbox shows location.details: Lightbox displays: name='Fin & Feathers - Edgewood (Atlanta)', address='345 Edgewood Ave SE, Atlanta, GA 30312'

Locations Page - ESC key closes lightbox.details: Pressing ESC key successfully closes the lightbox

Locations Page - Zoom icon appears on ho.details: ZoomIn icon appears when hovering over location card images

Admin edit modal - ImageUploader compone.details: ImageUploader component shows 'Click or drag image to upload' text with Upload icon and 'Will be cropped to square' helper text

Admin edit modal - Shows 'Or enter URL d.details: 'Or enter URL directly:' label with URL input field is visible below the ImageUploader component
